XRWebGLSubImage.summary: NOTE Experimental The XRWebGLSubImage interface is used during rendering of WebGL layers.

XRWebGLSubImageColorTexture.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only colorTexture property of the interface represents the color object for the to render.
XRWebGLSubImageColorTexture.value: An opaque . See WebXR opaque textures for details.

XRWebGLSubImageColorTextureHeight.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only colorTextureHeight property of the interface is a number representing the height in pixels of the GL attachment.
XRWebGLSubImageColorTextureHeight.value: A number indicating the height in pixels.

XRWebGLSubImageColorTextureWidth.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only colorTextureWidth property of the interface is a number representing the width in pixels of the GL attachment.
XRWebGLSubImageColorTextureWidth.value: A number indicating the width in pixels.

XRWebGLSubImageDepthStencilTexture.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only depthStencilTexture property of the interface represents the depth/stencil object for the to render.
XRWebGLSubImageDepthStencilTexture.value: An opaque . See WebXR opaque textures for details.

XRWebGLSubImageImageIndex.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only imageIndex property of the interface is a number representing the offset into the texture array if the layer was requested with texture-array; null otherwise.
XRWebGLSubImageImageIndex.value: A number or null if the layer wasn't requested with texture-array.
